name: Kpop Idols Rescue
description:
Crazy jealous, the evil lord kidnapped all Kpop Idols.

Should you join the "Kpop Avengers" team to rescue them all?

The main game play is match-three and use Kpop idols unique skills to defeat all the evil.
But if you want to rescue our idols, it's take more than just fight...
